cave.entrance_message: You enter the dark, mysterious cave. The air is cool and damp.

search_for_treasure.name: Search for treasure
search_for_treasure.message: You search the cave floor for hidden treasures.

events.name: find_treasure
events.message: You find a sparkling gemstone hidden in a crevice!

events.name: nothing
events.message: You don't find anything valuable this time.

examine_walls.name: Examine the walls
examine_walls.description: Look closely at the cave walls
examine_walls.message: You examine the cave walls closely.
examine_walls.additional_message: The walls are covered in strange mineral formations that glitter in the dim light.
examine_walls.with_torch_message: With your torch, you can see ancient markings carved into the stone.

listen_for_sounds.name: Listen for sounds
listen_for_sounds.message: You stop and listen carefully to the sounds in the cave.
listen_for_sounds.additional_message: You hear the distant drip of water and the echo of your own breathing.

use_torch.name: Use torch (if you have one)
use_torch.description: Light up the cave with a torch

with_torch.message: You light your torch, illuminating the cave around you.
with_torch.additional_message: The flickering light reveals hidden passages and beautiful rock formations.

without_torch.message: You don't have a torch to light.
